(In reply to comment #1)
> James - which build was this?

I believe it's I200506200301, the one right after M7 build.

I think I've fixed this bug. Looking back at the defect it looks like it was
fixed on June 21 - which would be after your current build. 

Can you take a look at Bug# 100647 - and see if the symptoms described in the
bug are the same as what you encountered? (i.e. when you open the Search Dialog
no Limit To (Declaration, Definition etc.) is set).

James - Looking at trace stack I'm sure that I fixed this + I can't reproduce
from what's in head (Limit To is always filled). You can verify this in the RC1
build.

- BG
